LDR.title: Leader
LDR.description: Fixed field that comprises the first 24 character positions (00-23) of each bibliographic record and consists of data elements that contain numbers or coded values that define the parameters for the processing of the record.

p.title: Increase in encoding level from prepublication

r.title: Three-dimensional artifact or naturally occurring object

005.title: Date and Time of Latest Transaction

007.title: Physical Description
007.description: Special information about the physical characteristics in a coded form. The information may represent the whole item or parts of an item such as accompanying material.

008.title: General Information
008.description: Forty character positions (00-39) that provide coded information about the record as a whole and about special bibliographic aspects of the item being cataloged. These coded data elements are potentially useful for retrieval and data management purposes.
